snippet: In an interview with Fox News, Mr. Cruz questioned descriptions of Jeb Bush as a “front-runner” and whether Mr. Bush could win an early state in the nominating contests.
abstract: In an interview with Fox News, Mr. Cruz questioned descriptions of Jeb Bush as a “front-runner” and whether Mr. Bush could win an early state in the nominating contests.

byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN and KITTY BENNETT

headline.main: Ted Cruz Wonders About Jeb Bush’s Viability
